channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- ASP.NET
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- ASP.NET

item.title: CVE-2017-11883|2024-08-05T18:19:39.340Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- asp.net
item.description: .NET Core 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0 allow an unauthenticated attacker to remotely cause a denial of service attack against a .NET Core web application by improperly handling web requests, aka ".NET CORE Denial Of Service Vulnerability".
